item.description:
We do present a fair and balanced approach to winter... This movie features Snowboarders and Skiers doing some sick stuff! Come join me at the Roxy as we catch TGR's latest movie - Under the influence!

Note: Last year the movie didn't go on till 10PM - however, you do get the lift ticket if you arrive early enough... I am trying for the lift ticket...

Here's the trailer
Trailer for Under the Influence

Here is where to purchase tickets - Tickets: $25
TGR Tickets

Teton Gravity Research - Under the Influence
Friday, November 14, 2008
BOSTON, MA

SHOWTIME: Doors at 7:00 PM
Showtime at 8:00 PM

Boston Premiere of TGR'S Newest 16mm and HD Ski and Snowboard Film UNDER THE INFLUENCE

400 Free Lift Tickets to Mount Snow will be Given Away!

Please buy your Ticket before you RSVP "YES"

The Roxy
279 Tremont St
Boston, MA 02116
(617) 338-7699
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out my cellphone to Yes RSVPs
item.name: Wedeln @ Teton Gravity Research's Under the Influence
